tool.help: **What it does** Create MuData from AnnData is a tool that allows creating a muon.MuData object out of two AnnData objects for multimodal omics factorial analysis. The multimodal data is created by combining two AnnData objects as h5ad files into a MuData object as a h5mu file using muon. Furthermore, it runs pp.intersect_obs to keep only entries present in both modalities (AnnData objects) in the final MuData file.
